column4: Hello there how do I move some content from my ubuntu partition to a free partition
depends on your setup of your partions
and where your partitions are mounted
what do you wanna movebtw?
Some backup files , schmiedc
Is it possible
ok is your partition shown in "places" of your gnome menue?
schmiedc : Yes and I can mount it , but cannot create any documents in it
hm
have you checked the userrights of this partiton
maybe your current user is not allowed to create files
; How can I change the permission of the partition
hmm change the rights of the folder where it is mounted
I'll try
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File_system_permissions#Traditional_Unix_permissions
it may help you
